author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content: what will happen to the Kovan, Rinkeby, Goerli, and Ropsten networks post merge? Will they just be stalled on the final terminal block? Would the only viable testnet be Prater, etc Eth2 Testnets that become the Eth testnet?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> Most nets will be subsumed into a pos testnet via a merge. Some might be deprecated

author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content:
If you want to run an archival merge node, would you need to connect an archival beacon node and archival execution layer together, or is a split configuration something that would work? 

Also wondering how/if the interaction between one beacon node to many execution clients might work or what would be needed to configure it properly? Does the state of any of the connected execution clients matter or is that unimportant?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dannyryan> Config can be independent  on that full/archive axis

author: bridge-bot
content:
<dannyryan> 1 to many, CL:EL is generally supported by the api but i dont think any CL functionality supports this out of box today
You could write a middleware multiplexer very easily

author: remyroy
content: Most of the time, you can solve this my retrying a few times or a few minutes later.

author: thekkiidd
content: Turning off ublock origin seemed to help, maybe a coincidence though.

author: thekkiidd
content: Hey guys. So I participated in the old staking testnet from a year ago and just fired up the same box to help with Kintsugi testnet. So I was planning on just following these steps here  https://hackmd.io/dFzKxB3ISWO8juUqPpJFfw
